website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy smoker box at a surprisingly affordable price.
pros: This inexpensive smoker box is well made, easy to use, and easy to clean
Because of its small size, it doesn't hog grill space but holds enough wood chips to produce good flavor
cons: This box tends to discolor badly with use, which doesn't affect it's functioning, but makes it unsightly
It's made of thinner stainless steel than some of the other models, so it doesn't hold heat as well

customer_reviews.title: Wood Chip Smoker Box
customer_reviews.text: This little smoker box puts out a TON of smoke, but only for a short period. I purchased this a week before I purchased an actual smoker, I know, impulse buy but I was able to use it on a few chicken thighs. It actually turned out really good but not as good as an actual smoker. The most difficult part was maintaining the charcoal temperature and I only had to replace the wood chips and coal once in the 2 hours of smoking. Placed directly on top of the heated charcoal. Side note: I did not soak my chips. If you ask around they say it's best not to.
customer_reviews.author: QuyDaddi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent smoker box
customer_reviews.text: Excellent smoker box, tons of smoke but i used a mixture of wet and dry chips for best results or you will wait about 20-30 mins for smoke and that would go through the propane too fast....
customer_reviews.author: VETERAN

customer_reviews.title: Great on electric weber q1400!!
customer_reviews.text: Works amazingly well. I have used it a couple times with apple and hickory chips on my electric weber Q (condo life, no gas/open flame hoa rules). Just placed the chips in the box, placed it on the grill grate, turned my grill on high and 15-20 min later smoke is being produced. Box seems sturdy and works great on the electric. Added wood smoke flavor to my electric grilled food. Awesome
customer_reviews.author: Ga4rd2en0er

customer_reviews.title: Works Super Well
customer_reviews.text: This smoker box exceeded what I expected! I was really pleased with the smoke ring on the tri-tip I cooked first. I cook with a standard round Weber charcoal BBQ and cannot spend a bunch of money ($300+) on a super quality smoker or combo unit. Great find! I've seen some other brands fall apart and/or not produce the volume of smoke as this Cuisinart product. For me this was a very good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: works for me
customer_reviews.text: Unless you're going to shell out for a dedicated smoker, this is as good as it gets. The heavy gauge metal will stand up to some abuse and cleaned up nicely. I got a good amount of smoke on my average size gas grill. Just make sure you pull it off the direct heat once it gets going. I burned through the chips to quickly until I realized I was letting it get too hot.
customer_reviews.author: Chopper

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: I purchased more for gifts as I love my old one. These do not have attached lids which I prefer but are very well made and add so much to BBQing. Can't answer the cleaning question well as I don't clean them beyond emptying the ashes.
customer_reviews.author: Fork Road

customer_reviews.title: WASTE OF $9
customer_reviews.text: No smoke created as there are no holes in the bottom for flame to hit the wood. Out of the few smoker boxes I have work with, this is easily the worst.
customer_reviews.author: Mario J. Suley

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: It does it's job. Box quickly discolored after first use, but that's just a cosmetic issue. Lid simply sits atop the box, so it's easy to add more chips as needed. We've used it several times with our Weber gas grill and have been pleased with it's performance.
customer_reviews.author: HotBroccoli

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: The Amazon photo shows that the lid is attached and swivel from back end but I received the item and the lid is separate from the box. I prefer that the lid swivel because it was going to be easier and safe to refill when hot. Looks like I received another model, not the one advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item for a close friend for Christmas....he loved it!! Also got him some of the flavored wood chips for it as he loves to grill. Can't go wrong with this as a gift or for yourself!!
customer_reviews.author: Gio

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product and a must for anyone with an iphone
customer_reviews.text: the item allowed for you to transfer photos to Iphone and take photos off of Iphone. You can also upload a movie and play with ease without downloading it to the iphone. I put a home movie on it and was able to watch it by just clicking on it it in the app.
customer_reviews.author: Carol L. Garmire

customer_reviews.title: The Last Smoker Box You Will Ever Need
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and well made. It replaced a rusted cast iron model that I had for years. This is much better because it has the perfect amount of holes in the top to release the smoke. This will last forever.
customer_reviews.author: RDCprc

customer_reviews.title: That smokey taste is possible with a gas grill
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase for my grill. You can see, smell and taste the difference. This is a must if you have a gas grill. The size of this smoke box is great since it doesn't take up your entire grill. Just make sure to soak your wood chips for 30 min before using, and go "low and slow" -- 250-300F.
customer_reviews.author: eus

customer_reviews.title: Very little smoke...
customer_reviews.text: This box has no holes in the bottom which means there is very little airflow and virtually no smoke. I placed it directly on top of the heat source using a gas grill. By comparison, I bought a different smoker box that does have holes in the bottom, and I got a ton of smoke. I would recommend a different product for smoking meats.
customer_reviews.author: James Greer Fowler

customer_reviews.title: They should be started with a propane torch before grilling
customer_reviews.text: Get the wood started well before attempting to grill with it, otherwise your food will be finished before the smoke starts adequately to season the food...
customer_reviews.author: Blakmagick

customer_reviews.title: Good for home use.  Not adequate for large smoking projects
customer_reviews.text: Works well but does not have have holes on sides. Other styles tend to emit more smoke because of different design. Good for occasional home use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I am surprised at how well this works. Be sure to put on the grill at the start of preheat since it takes a while to reach smoking temperatures. It does work better when placed on the gas flavorizer bars.
customer_reviews.author: Abc

customer_reviews.title: ... Boston Butt on the gas grill and it was AWESOME! Had the taste of the apple chips that ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband used this to smoke a Boston Butt on the gas grill and it was AWESOME! Had the taste of the apple chips that he used in the chip box.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Galarneau

customer_reviews.title: Great wood chip box for gas BBQ's. Sturdy but light.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the way they cut the name out of the top steel lid. Allows more smoke to emerge in shorter time period. Very sturdy brushed steel box.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Allen

customer_reviews.title: High quality!
customer_reviews.text: High quality steel for smoking chips. Worked very well for our Memorial Day BBQ!
customer_reviews.author: Scott H. Billingsley

customer_reviews.title: Very fast and effective, watch out for the sharp edges
customer_reviews.text: Very effective for adding wood smoke flavor to any BBQ. Very fast on the preheating phase to start the smoking action. Watch out cleaning it though, the cover and the box have very sharp wedge. If you can, sand the edges a bit to prevent cutting when cleaning
customer_reviews.author: Coach Bill

customer_reviews.title: The perfect smoker box!
customer_reviews.text: Better than any smoker box that I’ve ever used. Over the years I’ve tried several boxes that either don’t fit or burn the wood too fast or too slow. This is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: charlie's dad

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders with a fake gas campfire!!!
customer_reviews.text: So happy we bought the Cuisinart Wood Chip Smoker Box along with our Camco Big Red Campfire In A Can!!! Both products work amazingly great for that wonderful campfire experience!!! The soot from the wood chips have given the fake logs authenticity (looks like burned wood), love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary

customer_reviews.title: Feels cheap
customer_reviews.text: Very thin. Ours came dented right out of the box. Given its purpose, we didn't think it would affect its use. But I wish I'd bought the cast iron one I saw first.if I had to get another, I probably would get cast iron.
customer_reviews.author: Holly DW

customer_reviews.title: Turn your grill into a smoker. You will love it
customer_reviews.text: Worked like a charm. Not much to review with this. Full with would and it smokes!
customer_reviews.author: Donyale

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has used it several times, and it provides just the perfect amount of smoke. It cleans easily.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Leaks.  Not made to old water.
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice but do not try to fill the container with water and chips because it doesn't hold water. You will need to soak the chips only.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Tam

customer_reviews.title: Great accessory
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect in my portable grill now I get to gave that smoked flavor on the go
customer_reviews.author: Thomas M. Rubcic

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical but it works!! Never using my grill without it again.
customer_reviews.author: DPM

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in a timely fashion ... everything was as agreed.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a timely fashion ... everything was as agreed.
customer_reviews.author: academicjock

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works better that I thought it could. Added a great flavor to my steaks
customer_reviews.author: Michael Mccann

customer_reviews.title: A perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: This Cuisinart smoker box was a perfect fit! Extremely easy to use, and just the right size to get the job done for large and small BBQ’s. Our summer grilling was delicious and a hit thanks to this handy item!
customer_reviews.author: osider

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty good. I occasionally take the lid off partially ...
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty good. I occasionally take the lid off partially to get a little more smoke action. But, overall, I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice product. Well made and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Saluces

customer_reviews.title: Wood Chip Box
customer_reviews.text: A great box.. Put the chips in and let them burn
customer_reviews.author: Robert Ciarrocchi

customer_reviews.title: Cuisinart Wood Cjip Smoker
customer_reviews.text: It was aa Fat.hers Day gift and my dad loved it. I bought some wood chips to go with it
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware--you may not get a hinged lid.
customer_reviews.text: Version that was sent did not have a hinged lid--hinged lid is pictured on the page for this item. Seems trivial, until you have to open this box to replace chips multiple times during a 12-hour smoking experience.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew H.

customer_reviews.title: great for flavored wood chips
customer_reviews.text: got this for my partner as he is a grilling maniac...lol He said this works wonderful and he has used it with several different flavored woods.
customer_reviews.author: N. Mason

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something like this and was glad to come across this. It works perfectly! No more putting the wood straight on the coals. This allows me to get a longing smoking time than before, so more of the flavor can get in the food.
customer_reviews.author: JDorsey7

customer_reviews.title: Quality product, great price!
customer_reviews.text: Quality product, great price, fast shipping, five star purchase experience
customer_reviews.author: J.R.E.

customer_reviews.title: didn't realize how much wasted gas you would need to use to actually BBQ/Smoke ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. However, didn't realize how much wasted gas you would need to use to actually BBQ/Smoke on a gas grill with this.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Aced

customer_reviews.title: but not so bad that hurts it's performance
customer_reviews.text: Warped after first use, but not so bad that hurts it's performance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have two of these vey nice job as a smoker box
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Works but Just OK
customer_reviews.text: It works but I think it's easier to just use aluminum foil.
customer_reviews.author: K D

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great; have used it a few times to do ribs.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: Well cinstructed of heavy gauge steel. This smoker box should last many years.
customer_reviews.author: BT

customer_reviews.title: Worked exactly as expected
customer_reviews.text: Worked exactly as expected. Can use it in my electric smoker or on the grill.
customer_reviews.author: Eric P

customer_reviews.title: Missing screw when arrived!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived today and the screw on the side is missing so therefore one side falls apart/down..
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: if you like to BBQ
customer_reviews.text: if you like to BBQ. specially hamburgers and steaks, then teh cuisinart CSB-156 is what you need. The flavor will be different and you will enjoy more your BBQ. The only negative is that you will definitely eat more.
customer_reviews.author: simon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome smoky flavor
customer_reviews.text: Great for smoking some meat with hickory or applewood. Works perfectly outdoors. Don't try it indoors...you'll make a smoky mess!
customer_reviews.author: Pablo Wunderlich

customer_reviews.title: worked great. Seems to be made of strong materials
customer_reviews.text: Used this twice, worked great. Seems to be made of strong materials.
customer_reviews.author: Scott K

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nifty wood chip container that should last for quite a while
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Swenson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked as expected and better smoke distribution than tin foil pack.Order received on time.
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: This is great. Absolutely makes a difference
customer_reviews.text: This is great. Absolutely makes a difference. I got some applewood chips from the hardware store, and made the best pork chops I have ever made.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Staat

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great on our gas grill! Just what dad needed!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Lee

customer_reviews.title: Thin stainless steel doesn't hold the heat properly to give ...
customer_reviews.text: Thin stainless steel doesn't hold the heat properly to give the wood chips a slow burn. I would get one that is made of cast iron.
customer_reviews.author: Kent Linder

customer_reviews.title: Made in good taste
customer_reviews.text: It works just the way it was designed to work. It did the job I was hoping it would do. The inventor must have a cook himself.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Tudela Maanao

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this box...never warped and does the job...
customer_reviews.author: brian m

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: very nice use with any regulr grill to add the smoke favor
customer_reviews.author: Kurt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works great for all types of chips for your bbq pleasure
customer_reviews.author: gtoolmaker

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The coating scratches off very easily, so far gets the job done
customer_reviews.author: OA

customer_reviews.title: Great smoker box
customer_reviews.text: Great smoker box. Used it the first day I received it and couldn't be happpier! Has held up well.
customer_reviews.author: ACap

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This works well and is my favorite smoker box so far.
customer_reviews.author: McG

customer_reviews.title: they have great products for the home
customer_reviews.text: After researching ALL the wood chip smokers I settled on the Stainless steel Cuisinart; they have great products for the home. I've proven that to myself that if I wait to get exactly what I want it will never let me down to need to do a repeat purchase in the future. Soon as my new regulator arrives for my Stainless Steel barbeque then I will test it for some delicious meats.
customer_reviews.author: J Terry

customer_reviews.title: Great Find
customer_reviews.text: Love this idea. Works perfectly. I did not know this existed until I ran across it on amazon. I was looking at buying a electric smoker, but the price kept going up with the season. When I found this product my reason for buying it was price and smaller space. I already had a propane grill. I figured what the heck, I see if it works. It did beautifully. The only draw back I can think of is smoking larger things like a roast.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Does a superb job and well made.
customer_reviews.text: This smoker box is just the right size and not too big. Easy to just dump out old chips and clean. Gives off just the right amount of smoke while cooking. Soak chips well first to prevent burning. The apple chips work the best IMO for a mild flavor.
customer_reviews.author: CatDaddy & Biatch

customer_reviews.title: Keep Looking. Not as Expected
customer_reviews.text: This product was a huge disappointment. Did not work for me as I was hoping or how some of the reviews described. I even tried a few different things then resorted to drilling a few holes on the underside of it and still not what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: John Lion

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: its okay didn't really create the smoker effect in my gas grill.
customer_reviews.author: VF

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Product Wood Chip smoker box.
customer_reviews.text: It appears to be of very good quality and well designed. The only reason I have not given it a five star rating is out BBQ is under repair with a leaking gas valve and we have not had an opportunity to try it! The old steel unit that it replaced was severely rusting and dropping rusted metal particles all over our BBQ.
customer_reviews.author: krazo

customer_reviews.title: Gets pretty ugly even after one use however
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says. Gets pretty ugly even after one use however.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: This was supposed to fit my note 8 and it does not, and I can't return it
customer_reviews.author: yamile betancourth

customer_reviews.title: You get what they sell
customer_reviews.text: Box is as advertised but nothing more. On the PLUS side it is stainless steel.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip J. Seaman

customer_reviews.title: wood chip box
customer_reviews.text: Wish it was larger, and the sides of the lower box be together to hold the water from the wood.
customer_reviews.author: Treva Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I am not able to get enough heat into box to allow smoke to be made.
customer_reviews.author: shelden taxer

customer_reviews.title: Haven't used the box yet but it looks of great quality and I can't wait to use it on ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used the box yet but it looks of great quality and I can't wait to use it on my gas grill.
customer_reviews.author: Swami

customer_reviews.title: Did its job...
customer_reviews.text: It did its job, decent quality product. Only real complaint is that it easily got burn marks. Doesn't affect the functionality, but at this price you would think they would of coated with something that would not retain burn/grill marks since that is its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: SF East Bay

customer_reviews.title: Very well made cold smoker.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: 1. The steel is very thick stainless and feels very well made. 2. Was easy to load with pellets and easy to clean afterwards. 3. Ran for a little over 3.5 hours to a load of pellets. 4. Used this and my Kamado grill to make some great smoked cheese. I look forward to trying cold smoked salmon. Cons: 1. I wish it was bigger - to cold smoke salmon i will have to refill it at least 2 times.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Dru

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to use on the grill and even in your oven. Does not make a huge mess. I got my flavored chips at our retail chain hardware store. They always carry a large selection of different flavored wood chips next to the barbecue grills and lawn mowers. This is so much more easier than using a smoker which can be such a huge hassle and time consuming. Especially when you want to make a smaller portion of smoked meats and not a huge batch. We have used it to make smoked chicken and a pork roast. Can't wait to smoke some fish with it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Pellet smoker
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been wanting a smoker for awhile. This is the next best thing, he had seen the pellets being used on the bbq videos he watches and knew the concept but we had yet to try it. We got some of the pellets and filled it up and put it on the grill with chicken. The chicken came out delicious, there wasn't as much of the smoky taste as I had expected, but it was really good.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. ChaCha

customer_reviews.title: Smoke is the way to go!
customer_reviews.text: Cuisinart CPT-875 12” Stainless Steel Triangle Pellet Tube elevates grilling to a new level. I like the triangular prism shape of this. It’s easy to add wood to it and just set it off to the side of the grill. Cleaning it is a bit tricky, but I’m not sure it really needs to be cleaned. The sleek shiny metal looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Etienne

customer_reviews.title: Works just like my Napoleon smoking tube
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great and easy to use. It comes with instructions if you've never smoked before. Just fill with chips (or pellets) light and let burn for a few minutes and blow out the flame. Does a good job in my mid-sized grill. I used it to smoke a beer can chicken, it turned out delish. I recommend, it's an easy way to add smoke to your grilled food.
customer_reviews.author: Larson

customer_reviews.title: Easy smoking for your grill
customer_reviews.text: Easy grill smoker that keeps lit during smoking sessions. The tin foil method works but this little unit makes it much easier to keep your chips lit. So easy. Dump in chips. Light it. Toss on the back the grill. When you come back your meats will have the nice smoky taste that we crave.
customer_reviews.author: Sam I Am

customer_reviews.title: Add that flavor
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, easy way to add some smoke to a lot of applications. You can use it to add different smoke or smoke at a different time. It works if you want to cold smoke stuff. Easy to load, easy to light. Great addition to your grilling kit.
customer_reviews.author: anonymousY

customer_reviews.title: Be sure you have a propane torch handy....
customer_reviews.text: This pellet tobe is very well made, but being a grilling neophyte, I didn't realize you need a propane torch to get the wood you put in it to start burning. This should last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: M. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Awesome must-have grill item!
customer_reviews.text: Small smoke box is just right. Put store-bought wood chips - the smaller the better. Soak your chips at least an hour. The flavor from the smoke is phenomenal.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Picadash

customer_reviews.title: well made, great for slow burn of pellets
customer_reviews.text: This works well. It's easy to put the pellets in and it works great in the bottom of my smoker. It cleans easily and keeps the pellets as a slow burn. Overall, I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Nice way to add smoky flavor
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice way to add smoky flavor to your food if you have a grill that doesn't take wood pellets. It's easy to use and to clean. Made well with quality materials.
customer_reviews.author: Smartly Created

customer_reviews.title: Works great in Weber
customer_reviews.text: Holds a good amount of chips. Fits great in Weber genesis. Fits on flavor bars and under grill without a problem. Great smoke!
customer_reviews.author: PeachyMom

customer_reviews.title: Finally--apple wood flavor and aroma in my barbecue!
customer_reviews.text: I love the flavor of apple wood on my steaks. My husband likes hickory. We, however, haven't had much success with home-smoker units. This Cuisinart Smoke Accessory was sent to me by Vine and I have to say that at first, it seems rickety and a little hard to manage. It's actually quite effective, and when loaded up with wet apple chips, and used according to the directions, it infuses your meats with the lovely apple wood flavor and aroma. Delish! It's utilitarian (nothing fancy about it) but quite effective. The price (15$ today, 12-19) is very reasonable, too. So far, it's held up without issue for a week of testing.
customer_reviews.author: K.C.

customer_reviews.title: Cuisinart Wood Chip Smoker Box
customer_reviews.text: Great for the grill. Just remember to soak the wood chips for 15 minutes before putting on grill. Takes about 10-15 mins after that for the smoking action to take place. It will also clear the area of mosquitoes real quick!
customer_reviews.author: JKT

customer_reviews.title: Enhance your flavor
customer_reviews.text: This little smoker box is a great way to enhance your grilling. Just fill the thing with wet, fragrant wood chips and you'll smoke some flavor into whatever is on the grill. You can also add liquid - like apple juice for extra flavor. I particularly like to use fruit woods like apple and cherry. This is really convenient if you don't own a separate smoker, or just want to add smoke to some burgers and steaks. The box is small - won't take up room on your grill. It's pretty solid and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: J. Moore

customer_reviews.title: A Great Way to Add Flavor to Grilled Foods
customer_reviews.text: The Cuisinart Smoke and Humidity Grill Box is a great way to add smoky flavor to your grilled meats, seafood and vegetables. Just soak your wood chips, put them in the grill box and add the box to your grill. You can even impart more flavor by adding different liquids to the grill box. It's super easy to use on any type of grill. My husband seems to get new ideas daily about how to flavor our grilled foods. This will definitely become one of our daily use products in the spring and summer.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Efficient
customer_reviews.text: This is an easy and efficient way to add smoke and moist u 're to your grill is foods. It works with all grills-gas, electric, charcoal. Simply place soaked wood chips in the perforated side and the liquid of your choice in the other. I was amazed at just how much flavor developed and how nice and juicy the meat turned out. My first experiment was with pork chops, Apple wood and cider. It was a success. This is an easy way to impart smoke to your home grill.
customer_reviews.author: Antigone Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad, low cost way to add smoke flavor to your grill. My friend swears by this if you do not want to go all in with a separate propane, electric or charcoal smoker. It's not high end, but should last a couple of seasons depending on usage and storage conditions. Nothing says BBQ like that smokey flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Bunson Honeydew

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great little item. Easy to use and it produces a perfect level of subtle smokiness.
customer_reviews.author: Duckman

customer_reviews.title: works for me
customer_reviews.text: Unless you're going to shell out for a dedicated smoker, this is as good as it gets. The heavy gauge metal will stand up to some abuse and cleaned up nicely. I got a good amount of smoke on my average size gas grill. Just make sure you pull it off the direct heat once it gets going. I burned through the chips to quickly until I realized I was letting it get too hot.
customer_reviews.author: Konrad Braunschweig

customer_reviews.title: Great Smoker Box
customer_reviews.text: A friend of mine just gifted me one of these after working wonders with his own. Broke it in over the holiday weekend and trust me when I say it made a difference for the ribs and dogs we had going on on the grill. The box was perfect, but don't foret to soak your woodchips, increases the smoke effect.
customer_reviews.author: DaveOcean

customer_reviews.title: Better with Bacon.
customer_reviews.text: My brother recently got a huge smoker from his girlfriend---they have been smoking everything they can get their hands on. Upon tasting the delicious meats they prepared---I wanted to try it in my small patio in a big city. Between the size and efficiency--this is definitely the product I needed. I smoked a couple of pounds of fresh bacon and have been able to freeze it and use it over a few months. GREAT PROduct.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin0513

customer_reviews.title: ... tried this with a chicken breast and it tasted fine, but nothing special
customer_reviews.text: I tried this with a chicken breast and it tasted fine, but nothing special. Also, the box is too small for even one large chicken breast. I had to cut it in order to use it.
customer_reviews.author: DJY51

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I turn the gas grill on hi and I toss in a handful of dry chips in the container and put it on the rack, close the grill lid and in very few minutes (by the time I go inside to get whatever Im cooking), theres lots of smoke pouring out. Yes, it gets discolored but it has no affect on the flavor. I had a cast iron one that would rust no matter what I did to season it. I threw it away .
customer_reviews.author: GH

product_meta.title: Cuisinart CSB-156 Wood Chip Smoker Box
product_meta.description: Style:Wood Chip Smoker BoxThe Cuisinart Wood Chip Smoker Box infuses your barbecue with delicious smoky flavors just like the pros. Simply place a handful of pre-soaked cedar, hickory, mesquite or other wood chips in the stainless steel smoker box and place the box on your gas or charcoal grill while cooking. In no time, your grill comes to life with aromas you thought only the professionals could create. Your meat, fish and poultry capture the smoky flavor, turning your basic barbecue into delicious gourmet meals. What's best is that the compact size takes up very little space on your grill, so the smoker box works great with any grill size. Innovative culinary tools are the Cuisinart signature. The prestigious Cuisinart brand is not limited to their famous food processors - plugged or unplugged, nobody covers the modern chef like Cuisinart. Cuisinart is a full-service culinary resource with a wide array of products, preferred by chefs and favored by consumers. And now you can take the world famous Cuisinart brand to your patio, lawn, tailgate, or campsite with their comprehensive line of Cuisinart outdoor grilling products available now on Amazon. Features: Measuress 9 inches x 4 inches|Durable stainless steel construction|For use with gas and charcoal grills
